Hack.help: You perform a standard attack with your katana. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Hack.targetHelp: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Slash.help: You perform a quick slash with your katana. This attack is very fast, but deals only minor damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast
Slash.targetHelp: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Slice.help: You swing your katana in a wide arc in front of you, slicing multiple foes. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Slice.targetHelp: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Taunt.help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.victimHit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.victimHit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Parry.help: You can use your katana to parry incoming melee attacks and then quickly return the favor. Divine Avalanche does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Build_Up.help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Whirling_Sword.help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Whirling_Sword.targetHelp: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Disembowel.help: You perform a powerful Soaring Dragon maneuver that deals a great amount of damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Disembowel.targetHelp: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Head_Splitter.help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.targetHelp: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.
